translations: 遗赠；把……遗赠给；把……传下去

sentences.sentence: She said if the world did not act conclusively now, it would only bequeath the problem to future generations.
sentences.translation: 她说如果这个世界现在不采取正确的行动，那只会把问题遗留给后代。

sentences.sentence: My small estate I bequeath to my mother;
I bequeath to you today one little girl ...
sentences.translation: 我今天交给你一个小女孩。。。
